attributes.action: Save Teesside Steelworks and the 1,700 jobs that will be lost
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the government to step in save the 1,700 jobs that will be lost, at a devastating cost to the area, should Corus be able to mothball the Teesside steelworks, ending over 100 years of steelmaking on Teesside. We ask they do this with the knowledge that in the long run the works will be a profitable venture as the country leaves recession and industries such as construction pick up again.
